jot.math.geometry.bounding

Class OBB

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.bounding.AbstractBoundingVolume
      • jot.math.geometry.bounding.OBB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node, Renderable

    public class OBB
extends AbstractBoundingVolume
    Class that implements a Object Aligned Bounding Box (OBB).
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
